McpServer.Name: sample-rest-api-mcp-server
McpServer.Description: MCP Server bridging to SampleRestApi - exposes employees, products, orders, and inventory as tools

get_all_employees.description: Get a list of all employees

get_employee.description: Get details of a specific employee by ID

search_employees.description: Search for employees by name or department

get_all_products.description: Get a list of all products from the inventory

get_product.description: Get detailed information about a specific product

get_all_orders.description: Get a list of all orders

get_inventory.description: Get current inventory status for all products

update_stock.description: Update stock quantity for a product
